page.name: Congratulations!
page.content:
Congratulations!

You've completed this course on How to Pray the Holy Rosary!

What You've Learned

  • ✓ The history and purpose of the Rosary
  • ✓ All the prayers of the Rosary
  • ✓ How to use rosary beads
  • ✓ The four sets of mysteries
  • ✓ Techniques for meditation
  • ✓ How to build a daily habit

Next Steps

  1. Pray a complete Rosary today
  2. Commit to a daily schedule
  3. Share what you've learned with others

Take the Final Quiz below to test your knowledge!
